name: Space ShootemUp
description:
Controls:

Up, down, left, right arrow keys for movement.

Space to shoot.

Z to activate attack.

X to activate defense.

Fight against waves of enemies in space. Enemies will reward exp and upon death has a chance to drop an attack or defense object. Upon gaining sufficient amount of exp, the shooting pattern increases.

Attack summons two cannons which you can move, and by pressing attack again, creates a laser beam which wipes out whatever the laser contacts.

Defense creates a bubble that reflects the enemy's projectiles as homing missiles.

Made in June 2018.
